title: Alarm Clock - PiPitto
summary: "PiPitto" is the stylish Material design Alarm clock for Android OS
description: Easy! Simple! Convenient!You only need simple settings to customise alarm sounds with "PiPitto."products and services are made in Japan.You also can use it as a reminder also as an alarm.･Featuresstylish Material designWake up with your favorite musicSet custom labels for alarms with the textSet Repeat days of week alarmSnooze/Stop Alarm buttonsSound volume adjustableSnooze time customizableVibrate ON/OFF・Android Wearcompatible with Android Wear.Pair with any smartphone running Android 4.3 or higher.・MoreSound in silent mode.If your alarm does not sound,please check volume settings of your device.
descriptionHTML:
Easy! Simple! Convenient!
You only need simple settings to customise alarm sounds with "PiPitto."
products and services are made in Japan.
You also can use it as a reminder also as an alarm.


･Features
stylish Material design
Wake up with your favorite music
Set custom labels for alarms with the text
Set Repeat days of week alarm
Snooze/Stop Alarm buttons
Sound volume adjustable
Snooze time customizable
Vibrate ON/OFF


・Android Wear
compatible with Android Wear.
Pair with any smartphone running Android 4.3 or higher.


・More
Sound in silent mode.
If your alarm does not sound,
please check volume settings of your device.
